sentence: Looking at options trading activity among components of the Russell 3000 index, there is noteworthy activity today in Synchronoss Technologies Inc (Symbol: SNCR), where a total volume of 2,751 contracts has been traded thus far today, a contract volume which is representative of approximately 275,100 underlying shares (given that every 1 contract represents 100 underlying shares).
That number works out to 96.5% of SNCR's average daily trading volume over the past month, of 285,085 shares.
Especially high volume was seen for the $45 strike call option expiring September 16, 2016 , with 2,585 contracts trading so far today, representing approximately 258,500 underlying shares of SNCR.

Below is a chart showing SNCR's trailing twelve month trading history, with the $45 strike highlighted in orange:

Verisign Inc (Symbol: VRSN) options are showing a volume of 10,241 contracts thus far today.
That number of contracts represents approximately 1.0 million underlying shares, working out to a sizeable 82.2% of VRSN's average daily trading volume over the past month, of 1.2 million shares.
Particularly high volume was seen for the $70 strike put option expiring December 16, 2016 , with 3,651 contracts trading so far today, representing approximately 365,100 underlying shares of VRSN.

Below is a chart showing VRSN's trailing twelve month trading history, with the $70 strike highlighted in orange:

And Procter & Gamble Co. (Symbol: PG) options are showing a volume of 53,984 contracts thus far today.
That number of contracts represents approximately 5.4 million underlying shares, working out to a sizeable 60.5% of PG's average daily trading volume over the past month, of 8.9 million shares.
Especially high volume was seen for the $120 strike put option expiring October 14, 2016 , with 10,500 contracts trading so far today, representing approximately 1.1 million underlying shares of PG.

Below is a chart showing PG's trailing twelve month trading history, with the $120 strike highlighted in orange:
